description:
A classmate of Kuzumi Hiroshi.
A male student who has started to talk to him often lately.
Because people moving in from the outside are rare and he isn`t the only one who was approached by him, Hiroshi thinks nothing of it.
He is basically a good guy, but occasionaly he cracks some pretty strange jokes, which gave Hiroshi the creeps.
name: Ogasawara Muneyoshi
